009package imagingbook.common.filter.edgepreserving;
010
011import imagingbook.common.image.access.OutOfBoundsStrategy;
012import imagingbook.common.math.VectorNorm.NormType;
013import imagingbook.common.util.ParameterBundle;
014
015public interface BilateralF {
016        
017        public static class Parameters implements ParameterBundle {
018
019                @DialogLabel("Sigma (domain)")
020                public double sigmaD = 2;               
021
022                @DialogLabel("Sigma (range)")
023                public double sigmaR = 50;
024                
025                @DialogLabel("Color distance norm")
026                public NormType colorNormType = NormType.L2;
027
028                @DialogLabel("Out-of-bounds strategy")
029                public OutOfBoundsStrategy obs = OutOfBoundsStrategy.NearestBorder;
030        }
031        
032        // ------------------------------------------------------
033        
034        // TODO: this should be non-public (implement with Java9)
035        static float gauss(double d, double sigmaR2) {
036                return (float) Math.exp(-(d * d) / (2 * sigmaR2));
037        }
038        
039        // This returns the weights for a Gaussian range kernel (scalar version):

043//              //return (float) Math.exp(-(dI * dI) / (2 * sigmaR2));
044//      }

049//              int size = K + 1 + K;
050//              float[] rangeKernel = new float[size]; //center cell = kernel[K]
051//              double sigma2 = sigma * sigma;
052//              for (int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
053//                      double x = K - i;
054//                      rangeKernel[i] =  (float) Math.exp(-0.5 * (x*x) / sigma2);
055//              }
056//              return rangeKernel;
057//      }

059}
